item.title: Installing Python on a local Windows-based, Apache, server
item.description: In this article, we'll be installing Python on our local server via ActiveState's ActivePython.

item.title: A local, Apache Web server, on a Windows XP computer
item.description: A listing of tutorials on how to add various functionality to a local, Apache, server.
